description: Pierce Paris and JJ Knight have hung up the stockings, trimmed the tree, and left out the milk and cookies for Santa, and they're all ready for their first Christmas together, but the red-suited man who creeps into the house that night isn't Saint Nick, but sinner Michael Del Ray! Michael helps himself to some treats and opens a present, soon fucking his ass with the dildo JJ intended for Pierce. Pierce comes downstairs and catches the burglar red-handed, so he sticks his candy cane up Michael's ass...and Michael loves it! Soon it's JJ who hears a noise as Pierce pounds the intruder's hole, and the couple make their holiday merry by fucking Michael's mouth and ass till he cums, then leaving huge snow-white loads all over his face.
title: Jingle Balls Cock: Bareback
